snippet.title: Bacchikoi!
snippet.description:
Blackmonkey-Pro's second visual novel release: Bacchikoi!
-------------------------------------------------------------------------
The young transfer student, Toshu Kanada, gets himself recruited in a nearly-falling apart baseball club. His once small world opens up as he gets to know his teammates Ichiru and Masaru. 

Strike to the heart and take teamwork and friendship to a whole new level!
-----------------------
For more details about the game (including on how to purchase) visit the link below:
http://blackmonkey-pro.com/project/bacchikoi/
-----------------------
Bacchikoi OST: 'Strike'
Composed by: Mikkoukun
Arranged by: Mimi Neko
Vocals by: Kenji-B

Music Video by: Howl
